archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0744
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As provisioning specialist, when the customer needs to provice more information, I want the ability to request, via a digital channel and customer alert, further information from the customer in relation to a specific service (e.g. consent required for fibre build, hardware returned/unable to be delivered, site contact required etc), so that I can complete the order without picking up the phone.

properties.value: OOTB supported if all communication (by provisioning specialist also) in CRM. Let's discuss the flow of communication here (what does the provisioning specialist do, who provides/approves the consents ect)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
